title: Sony Expects PS5 To Sell More Than PS4 In First Year - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.06.20
description:
Imran and Fram discuss a smattering of PS5 details, a new Resident Evil movie, the biggest new F2P hit from China, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:11 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes),Black Jack, Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:03:12 - Sony Expects PS5 To Sell More Than PS4 Did In Its First Fiscal Year (Matt Purslow @ IGN)
00:13:57 - PS5 DualSense Was Developed With Help From Astro's Playroom Pack-In Game (Also Matt Purslow @ IGN)
00:19:15 - Sony Details How the PS5's Audio Will Work With TV Speakers and Headphones (Mat Olson @ USG)
00:30:25 -Genshin Impact: 17 Million Downloads on Mobile Alone, Estimated $50 Million in Revenue Since Launch (Jordan Oloman @ IGN)
00:36:25 - ‘Resident Evil’ Reboot: Kaya Scodelario, Robbie Amell, Hannah John-Kamen & More To Star In Origin Story Adaptation (Amanda N'Duka, Anthony D'Alessandro @ Deadline)
00:40:30 - QUICK HIT: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Introduces Robbie and Purah
00:40:44 - QUICK HIT: Banjo-Kazooie, Byleth, and Terry Are All Getting Smash Amiibos… in Fall 2021
00:43:00 - Out today
00:46:30 -  UPSTART 
00:47:50 -  QUIP 
00:49:50 -  BROOKLINEN 
 Reader mail   -
00:50:45 -  What is crunch
00:54:10 - Squad Up: Mitch Krassin(PS) - mk79797
00:54:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Whitta
